name: BRAIS on VESPA
description:
B.R.A.I.S  on V.E.S.P.A is a virtual artisitc installation where you can experiment the feeling of view the sound.

B.R.A.I.S is a synesthetic device that translate the sound waves on to electric pulses that light up the wire of the installation.

Soundtrack: Skygaze - Darjeeling  ( Weightless landscapes Album )

"on future upgrades you could use B.R.A.I.S and try differents musics."
